statements: UPDATE bike_routes SET route_name = 'City Tour', difficulty_level = 2 WHERE route_id = 1;
UPDATE bike_routes SET landmarks = 'Lake View, Park Entrance', distance = 15.5 WHERE route_id = 3;
UPDATE bike_routes SET distance = 10.5, landmarks = 'Park, Lake' WHERE route_id = 1
UPDATE bike_routes SET route_name = 'Forest Trail', difficulty_level = 3 WHERE route_id = 2
UPDATE bicycle_routes SET difficulty_level='Intermediate', distance=15.5 WHERE route_id=100
UPDATE trail_information SET landmarks='Mountain View, River Path', difficulty_level='Advanced' WHERE trail_id=50
UPDATE bicycle_routes SET route_name = 'Mountain Trail', difficulty_level = 'Hard', distance = 20.5, landmarks = 'Mountain Peak' WHERE route_id = 101;
UPDATE trail_information SET difficulty_level = 'Moderate', landmarks = 'River Crossing', distance = 15.7, trail_name = 'River Trail' WHERE trail_id = 201;
UPDATE BicycleRoutes SET route_name = 'New Route' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE Trails SET distance = 10.5, start_point = 'Start Trail' WHERE trail_id = 3
UPDATE BicycleRoutes SET route_name = 'Mountain Adventure' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Trails SET trail_name = 'River Trail', difficulty_level = 'Moderate', distance = 8.5, start_point = 'River Bank', end_point = 'Forest Grove' WHERE trail_id = 4;
UPDATE bicycle_routes SET route_name='Downtown Loop', distance_km=10.5 WHERE route_id=1;
UPDATE trail_info SET difficulty_level='Moderate', trail_type='Loop' WHERE trail_id=3;
UPDATE bicycle_routes SET difficulty_level = 'Intermediate', landmark_1 = 'Park', landmark_2 = 'Lake' WHERE route_id = 1;
UPDATE trail_info SET trail_type = 'Hiking', distance_km = 5.5 WHERE trail_id = 2;
UPDATE bicycle_routes SET landmarks='Lake View Park' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE popular_landmarks SET description='Historic castle' WHERE id=3;
UPDATE bicycle_routes SET route_name = 'Coastal Ride', difficulty_level = 'Moderate', landmarks = 'Beach views, Cliffside', distance_km = 15.2 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE trail_difficulty SET description = 'Challenging route with steep inclines and technical sections' WHERE difficulty_name = 'Difficult';
